mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Sys_User WHERE ur_usertype=2 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT dh_dyid FROM Desig_Home WHERE Desig_Home.dh_type=3 AND Desig_Home.dh_dyid = Sys_User.ur_id ) limit #{pagestart},#{pagesize}
SELECT count(ur_id) FROM Sys_User WHERE ur_usertype=2 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT dh_dyid FROM Desig_Home WHERE Desig_Home.dh_type=3 AND Desig_Home.dh_dyid = Sys_User.ur_id )
select ur_id from Sys_User where ur_usertype=1 and ur_personcode =#{invitecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select ur_phone from Sys_User where ur_id = #{ur_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into Sys_User_delete select * from Sys_User where ur_id= #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
